subject: [Mhln] Adobe Dreamweaver ready to download
body:
But a priest's life is not supposed to be well-rounded it is supposed to be one-pointed -- a compass, not a weathercock.

A well adjusted person is one who makes the same mistake twice without getting nervous.

A church is a place in which gentlemen who have never been to heaven brag about it to persons who will never get there.

Do it now. Then it's done.

Would you want to do business with a person who was 99 honest?

Our salvation is in striving to achieve what we know we'll never achieve.

To listen to some devout people, one would imagine that God never laughs.

The nice thing about being a celebrity is that, if you bore people, they think it's their fault.

A child learns to discard his ideals, whereas a grown-up never wears out his short pants.

Nothing retains less of desire in art, in science, than this will to industry, booty, possession.

In the long run, free trade benefits everyone in the short run it is bound to produce much pain.

All, everything that I understand, I understand only because I love.

Many commit the same crime with a different destiny one bears a cross as the price of his villainy, another wears a crown.
